titleStmt.title: The vvonders of this windie winter By terrible stormes and tempests, to the losse of liues and goods of many thousands of men, women and children. The like by sea and land, hath not beene seene, nor heard of in this age or the world.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld for Iohn Wright, and are to bee sold at his shop in Christ-Church dore,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with imprint "London. Printed for Ioseph Hunt and are to be sold by Iohn Wright, at his shop neere Christ-Church dore. 1613.".
Running title reads: Lamentable reports, of this windie winter.
Print blurred and show-through; title page stained; imprint date cut away (supplied by British Library Catalogue).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
